full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHAMBHA LAR SKYES PA'I SMON TSIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA 'DI NI SEMS CAN TSE 'DAS RNAMS LA SMON LAM 'DI LTA BU'I @005A *, ,ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR STAG LO'I DGUN ZLA THA MA'I TSES DRUG LA DAM PA'I MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA DGE, ,AOm SVASTI, 'DI SNANG 'GAG MA THAG ,SHAMBHA LAR SKYES NAS, ,RIGS LDAN RJES NAS KYANG, ,ZUNG 'JUG MYUR THOB SHOG ,BYANG SHAMBHA LAR SKYES PA'I SMON TSIG 'DI NI SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,)
